description.value:
Requirements You have at least one active hand free and are holding nothing in your other pair of hands.

You pummel an opponent mercilessly. Make a fist Strike against an adjacent creature. If the Strike hits, you automatically @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} the target in your inactive hands and make a second fist Strike with the following success conditions; the second Strike applies your multiple attack penalty as normal.

Critical Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} for 1 round.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} for 1 round.
